Your data is very important to us. Accordingly, we have developed this Policy in order to explain you how we collect, disclose and use personal information. The following outlines our privacy policy.
We will identify the purposes for which personal information is being collected.

We will collect and use personal information with the objective of fulfilling those purposes specified by us and for other compatible purposes, unless we obtain the consent of the individual or as required by law.
We will only retain personal information as long as necessary for the fulfillment of those purposes specified by us.
We will collect personal information by lawful and fair means and, where appropriate, with the knowledge or consent of the individual.
Personal data should be relevant to the purposes for which it is used and should be accurate, complete, and up-to-date.
We will protect personal information by reasonable security safeguards against loss or theft, as well as unauthorized access, disclosure, copying, use or modification.
We will provide customers with all information about our policies and practices relating to the management of personal information.
The media content that you provide is not considered to be personal information. So under these terms it appears to be the application\'s property that can be used inside the application.
We are committed to following all these principles in order to ensure that personal information is protected.
By signing up, you agree to the Terms of Service and Privacy Policy
To work with ddscanner you must enable location service. Do you want to do this?

By using this app, you are agreeing to be bound by these app Terms and Conditions of Use, all applicable laws and regulations, and agree that you are responsible for compliance with any applicable local laws.

The materials in this app are provided "as is". Deep Dive Scanner makes no warranties, expressed or implied, and hereby disclaims and negates all other warranties, including without limitation, implied warranties or conditions of merchantability, fitness for a particular purpose, or non-infringement of intellectual property or other violation of rights. Further, Deep Dive Scanner does not warrant or make any representations concerning the accuracy, likely results, or reliability of the use of the materials in its apps or otherwise relating to such materials or on any internet web sites linked to its apps.

In no event shall Deep Dive Scanner or its suppliers be liable for any damages (including, without limitation, damages for loss of data or profit, or due to business interruption,) arising out of the use or inability to use the materials in this app, even if Deep Dive Scanner or a Deep Dive Scanner authorized representative has been notified orally or in writing of the possibility of such damage. Because some jurisdictions do not allow limitations on implied warranties, or limitations of liability for consequential or incidental damages, these limitations may not apply to you.

The materials appearing in Deep Dive Scanner could include technical, typographical, or photographic errors. Deep Dive Scanner does not warrant that any of these materials are accurate, complete, or current. Deep Dive Scanner may make changes to the materials contained in its app at any time without notice. Deep Dive Scanner does not, however, make any commitment to update the materials.

Deep Dive Scanner has not reviewed all of the internet web sites linked to from its app and is not responsible for the contents of any such linked site. The inclusion of any link does not imply endorsement by Deep Dive Scanner of the site. Use of any such linked site is at the userOld\'s own risk.

Deep Dive Scanner may revise these terms of use for its app at any time without notice. By using this app you are agreeing to be bound by the then current version of these Terms and Conditions of Use.
How to add a dive spot?
How to edit a dive spot?
Why can’t I edit a dive spot?

The most active userOlds can become experts of a certain country due to their activity. We really appreciate every member of our diving community and grant the status of experts to those who participate actively in Deep Dive Scanner’s life. That can be those who left lots of reviews or added new dive spots, edited the information and shared lots of photos, etc. Divers can ask experts for their opinion that is highly respective and informative. We will also give experts new bonuses that will be helpful .

You can add a new dive spot that we could have missed. Just open your app and find the icon with plus on the right side, tap on it and fill in all the fields and add photos to tell our diving community more about this dive spot.

If you did not find a certain fish or other marine inhabitant you can create it either while adding a new dive spot or editing the existing one. Just tap on plus, type the name of the inhabitant you’d like to add, after that you see «add new», tap on this button and fill all the field required to provide necessary information to describe this inhabitant.

Open your app and find the dive spot you’d like to edit. Scroll down and you see the question «Is the information valid?». If you want to change choose «no» and correct the information that is not accurate.

Open your app and find the dive spot you\'d like to leave a review about. Scroll down and you see the button "Write a review". Or you can tap on stars to leave a review, rate this dive spot and add photos.
Dive spots that have been changed and confirmed by experts cannot be changed again.

We created DDScanner because we love diving. Time is valuable both under and above the surface of the water as it’s our most precious possession. We live now and don’t like planning in advance for life is so unpredictable. We should be able to «blow bubbles» anywhere, anytime, on our own terms. \n \nLet’s start the scanning…
